name: qr_endpoint
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool qr_code_api_updated.
Tool description: QR Code API updated version for any website
more to come in such format
API description: Generates a QR code for the given URL using the RapidAPI QR code service.

url.description: The website URL to encode in the QR code. Defaults to 'www.google.com'.
